name: AI-Content Assistant
description: Introducing the AI Content Assistant, your ultimate content creation companion in Notion.The AI Content Assistant is not just a tool, it's your personal content creation powerhouse. Here's what it can do for you:Idea Expansion: Takes your initial idea and expands it into a comprehensive concept, ready for content creation.Subtopic Ideas: Generates relevant subtopics to enrich your content and provide a well-rounded perspective on your idea.Emotion: Identifies the emotion that best aligns with yo
